settings.title: Alfa Laval ThinkTop®
settings.content:
The compact Alfa Laval ThinkTop® V50 and ThinkTop® V70 are the second-generation of the leading sensing and control units for hygienic valves. It ensures unmatched control of all Alfa Laval valves used in the dairy, food, beverage, brewery and pharmaceutical industries.

  • Fast, intuitive setup takes place in seconds
  • Smart control with 24/7 self-diagnostics
  • 360° LED visual status indication, visible from any direction
  • Built-to-last waterproof design withstands vibration and thermal expansion
  • Fastest ever burst seat cleaning reduces water consumption by up to 90%

ThinkTop® D30 is a cost-effective alternative for use where space is limited and operational simplicity and reliability is important. It is a compact and intelligent easy-to-install integrated control unit for hygienic applications.

settings.title: As an Alfa Laval master distributor we cover the full range of sensing and control products from Alfa Laval - just reach out!
settings.html:
• Indication units: Alfa Laval valve indication units provide basic information about the position of valves used in hygienic applications. Based on proven technology.
  • IndiTop: Straightforward and easy to use, IndiTop provides accurate and reliable information about the status of most standard sanitary valves used in the dairy, food and beverage, and biopharm industries.
  • ThinkTop®: The compact Alfa Laval ThinkTop V50 and V70 are the second-generation of the leading sensing and control units for hygienic valves.
  • ThinkTop® Basic: ThinkTop and ThinkTop Basic offers reliable operation, standard functionality and cost-effective operation for general applications in the dairy, food and beverage, and biopharm industries.
  • ThinkTop® D30: It is a cost-effective alternative for external solenoid valves to use where space is limited and operational simplicity and reliability is important.
  • ThinkTop® V20: Boost process productivity and secure product traceability with the Alfa Laval ThinkTop V20 valve indication unit.
